description.raw:
* Commit initial implementation and tests of GMTK error reports

    Adds a simplebadinput test to check for proper termination on a GMTK job
    submitted error. Adds documentation specifying how to better debug GMTK
    errors. Adds support to catch out of memory errors in GTMK versions 1.4.3 or
    above. Adds a better error message for errors that are not due to being out of
    memory.

* Add simple job resubmission test

* Add mininum constant for number of resubmittable job attempts per job.

* Add GMTK version checking during install. Change max job attempts to 2.

* Update NEWS
description.html:
• Commit initial implementation and tests of GMTK error reports

    Adds a simplebadinput test to check for proper termination on a GMTK job submitted error. Adds documentation specifying how to better debug GMTK errors. Adds support to catch out of memory errors in GTMK versions 1.4.3 or above. Adds a better error message for errors that are not due to being out of memory.

  • Add simple job resubmission test

  • Add mininum constant for number of resubmittable job attempts per job.

  • Add GMTK version checking during install. Change max job attempts to 2.

  • Update NEWS
